REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0398 reute r f BC-MICROSOFT-CORP-<MSFT> 02-26 0093

TEXT.TITLE: MICROSOFT CORP <MSFT> HALTS MS-DOS IMPORTS
TEXT.BODY: Microsoft Corp said it obtained a federal court order to seize a shipment of over 15,000 unauthorized copies of its MS-DOS operating system labeled "Falcon MS-DOS". Federal marshals made the seizure in San Francisco on Feb 17. Microsoft said the U.S. District Court for the Northern District of California also granted it a temporary restraning order against Wetex International, Quadrant Corp and other persons, prohibiting copyright infringement by reproducing Microsoft software. Reuter
